name: CAT AND LADDER CLIMB
description:
■
"CAT AND LADDER CLIMB" is a 2D pixel vertical scrolling action game.
Jump over scaffolding, use "ladders", and aim for the top goal!

■
"CAT AND LADDER CLIMB" can be played in 5 modes.
1:Default→Simple, goal-oriented mode.
2: Endless → No goal, mode to compete how high you can climb.
3: PvP → Offline PvP, a mode where you compete to see who can reach the goal first.
4: Fragile → A mode with a limit on the number of times you can use "ladder".
5: Mercenaries → Mode with time limit.

■
mouse and keyboard support
(Some game modes can be operated with a gamepad, but a mouse is required to operate the UI.)

■
Strategy tips
・Jump the scaffold and aim for the goal at the top.
・Use ladders to get over scaffolding where you can't reach by jumping.
・You can wall jump on vertical scaffolding.
・You can check the operation method in the in-game configuration.
